thread.title: Michael Scales
thread.title_full: Affordable Golf reviewed by Michael Scales

author: Michael Scales
title: Michael Scales
text: I ordered a single 6 iron and I got it in a few days but I had to email to get a tracking number but I had it within 3 days and it was perfect it was a half inch longer than standard and although it stated standard loft and lie it never stated the length
